case_circumstances: Discovered by passers-by; decedent was in a sitting position against a rock in a wooded area within the confines of Rock Creek Park. She was appropriately dressed for the cold winter weather with multiple layers of clothing.  In her jacket pockets were found a small flashlight, lip balm, a small bag of nuts and a small bag of wrapped hard candies
case_head_hair: The scalp hair is black with red highlights, straight, layered and measures 5-6 inches in length.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: all manufacturer's labels had been removed from the clothing except for the stamped size on the underwear stating size 8; blue winter coat with hood and front zipper; gray slacks; black turtle necked shirt; gray sweater, red shirt, black sleeveless shirt,
case_footwear: black, lace up boots - size 8.5 with label -> Basic Edition
case_jewelry: white metal rope chain holding a white metal cross with a purple stone in the center of the cross; wrist watch worn on right wrist, with white metal band and a white face.  Decedent was wearing a luggage tag held by a red canvas strap around her neck.
case_other_items_with_body: In her jacket pockets were found a small flashlight, lip balm, a small bag of nuts and a small bag of wrapped hard candies.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
